chav1961.purelib.ui.swing

Class SwingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.SwingUtils

  • public abstract class SwingUtils
extends Object

    This utility class contains a set of useful methods to use in the Swing-based applications.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

      • refreshLocale

        public static void refreshLocale(Component root,
                                 Locale oldLocale,
                                 Locale newLocale)
                          throws NullPointerException,
                                 LocalizationException

        Refresh localization content for all the GUI components tree

        Parameters:
        root - root of the GUI components to refresh localization
        oldLocale - old locale
        newLocale - new locale
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
        LocalizationException - in any localization errors

      • assignActionKey

        public static void assignActionKey(JComponent component,
                                   KeyStroke keyStroke,
                                   ActionListener listener,
                                   String actionId)
                            throws NullPointerException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException

        Assign key to process action on component

        Parameters:
        component - component to assign key to
        keyStroke - keystroke to assign
        listener - action listener to call
        actionId - action string to associate with the keystroke
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - any parameters are null
        IllegalArgumentException - some parameters are invalid

      • assignHelpKey

        public static void assignHelpKey(JComponent component,
                                 Localizer localizer,
                                 String helpId)
                          throws NullPointerException,
                                 IllegalArgumentException

        Assign standard F1 key listener for the given component to show standard Help screen in the Swing-based applications

        Parameters:
        component - component to assign F1 key to
        localizer - localizer to load help content from
        helpId - help content key in the localizer
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if component or localizer is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if helpId is null or empty or is missing in the localizer

      • showHelpScreen

        public static void showHelpScreen(Localizer localizer,
                                  String helpId)
                           throws LocalizationException,
                                  ContentException

        How standard help screen in the Swing-based applications

        Parameters:
        localizer - localizer to use for getting help content
        helpId - help content key in the localizer
        Throws:
        LocalizationException - on any errors in the localizer
        ContentException - on any errors in the help content

      • centerMainWindow

        public static void centerMainWindow(JFrame frame,
                                    float fillPercent)
                             throws NullPointerException

        Center main window on the screen

        Parameters:
        frame - main window
        fillPercent - filling percent on the screen. Must be in the range 0.0f..1.0f
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if frame is null

      • centerMainWindow

        public static void centerMainWindow(JDialog dialog)
                             throws NullPointerException

        Center main window on the screen

        Parameters:
        dialog - main window
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if dialog is null

      • centerMainWindow

        public static void centerMainWindow(JDialog dialog,
                                    float fillPercent)
                             throws NullPointerException

        Center main window on the screen and resize it to the given screen percent

        Parameters:
        dialog - main window
        fillPercent - filling percent on the screen. Must be in the range 0.0f..1.0f
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if dialog is null

      • assignActionListeners

        public static void assignActionListeners(JComponent root,
                                         Object entity)

        Prepare action listeners to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

        Parameters:
        root - root component to assign listeners to
        entity - object to call it's annotated methods

      • assignActionListeners

        public static void assignActionListeners(JComponent root,
                                         Object entity,
                                         SwingUtils.FailedActionListenerCallback onUnknown)

        Prepare action listeners to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

        Parameters:
        root - root component to assign listeners to
        entity - object to call it's annotated methods
        onUnknown - callback to process missing actions

      • assignActionListeners

        public static <T> void assignActionListeners(JComponent root,
                                             T entity,
                                             FormManager<?,T> manager)

      • buildAnnotatedActionListener

        public static ActionListener buildAnnotatedActionListener(Object entity)
                                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                          NullPointerException
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        NullPointerException

      • buildAnnotatedActionListener

        public static ActionListener buildAnnotatedActionListener(Object entity,
                                                          SwingUtils.FailedActionListenerCallback onUnknown)
                                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                          NullPointerException

        Build ActionListener to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

        Parameters:
        entity - marked instance to call methods in
        onUnknown - callback to process missing actions
        Returns:
        action listener built
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when no entity methods are marked with OnAction
        NullPointerException - when entity reference is null

      • buildEnabledGroup

        public static void buildEnabledGroup(AbstractButton leader,
                                     JComponent... members)

        Build enable group on the screen. When group leader is turned on, all it's members will be enabled. When group leader is turned off, all it's members will be disabled

        Parameters:
        leader - group leader (usually JCheckBox)
        members - members of the group
